name: Saving Santa Tree - LynxMas 2020
description:
Happy LynxMax 2020

(Youtube footage from early prototype)

This game was made in less than 15 days, for the LynXmas 2020.

A new Santa themed platformer for Atari Lynx, inspired by classics of the eighties.

You are Santa Claus and all ornment of your christmas Tree have been stolen by malicious leprechaums.

Your only way to get them back is to send a gift to each Leprechaum. I mean physicall sending a gift, in his face. Then he will left with the gift ant the ornment. You just have to pick it and put it on your Christmas Tree.

Once the 6 ornments have been put on the tree, you go to next level.

Will you have what it takes to go through the 10 levels of the game ?

Features :

Graphics :

- The Santa guy from Snowy Tiles and Sprites by AXLplosion
- Tree and tiles from Pixel Holiday Tree by VladPenn
- Walking ennemies from Stomper by ansimuz
-Modification of assets (I'm sorry but Lynx resolution is tiny) and  other assets from myself

Music / SFX :

- Fadest(based on traditionnal partition of Jingle Bells)

Levels :

- 10 layout by Fadest
- random ice platform

Tools :

Made in C with BLL Kit (Lars Baumstark, Matthias Domin, Bastian Schick) and ABC Music (Karri Kaksonnen)
